QuestData.Title: Joining the Assault
QuestData.Description: We need more men to join the main assault on Ymirheim.$B$BAny warrior with half a brain can tell you that vrykul are fierce fighters and should not be taken lightly. That goes two-fold for the Ymirjar. They have shown no restraint in proving to us why the Lich King deemed them worthy.$B$BGround Commander Koup is overseeing the assault. The city itself is located in the center of Icecrown - Koup's troops are positioned near the edge of the glacier, east of the city.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Ground Commander Koup at the edge of the glacier east of Ymirheim.
QuestData.RewardText: Welcome to hell, soldier.$B$BMy men are leading the assault on the gate from this position, and we're dropping some infiltrators in the city via air - we need more people on both fronts. I have a feeling that this attack will be going on for some time.
